Literature.Title: Improving the Antimicrobial Performance of Amphiphilic Cationic Antimicrobial Peptides Using Glutamic Acid Full-Scan and Positive Charge Compensation Strategies.
Literature.Author: Ouyang X, Li B, Yang Y, Ba Z, Zhang J, Zhang T, Chang L, Zhang F, Zhang Y, Liu H, Gou S, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Human glomerular mesangial cells (GMC):50% Cytotoxicity=>128 µM,Human kidney proximal tubule HK-2 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=8µM)
